td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches for about 4 weeks. pt is a 41 year old male gardener. he has a history of smoking describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 4 years in his past o:Height 177 cm, Weight 56.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt presents with 3 months history of Body Aches. he is a white M gardener aged 41 years. he drinks 2 beers per night he has a history of smoking o:Height 177 cm, Weight 56.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cefuroxime axetil - 500 mg 2x day.

td.content: s:patient c/o 6 weeks h/o Body Aches. NKDA. he is a 41 yr old M. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 56.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:patient reports Body Aches from time to time. he is a 41 YO male. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 56.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered B. burgdorferi Ab in CSF.
